short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a filter on the team tournament page, for a better end-user experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds 3 buttons on the page of https://esportal.com/*/ team pages, so the end-user can filter Live or completed tournaments.

This is used to make it easer to navigate to live games on the website.
